p: Thickness is one of the important factors in the film, which directly affects the biological characteristics and durability of the packaged product. According to the results, adding anise essential oil to 1% concentration does not affect the thickness of the film. Increasing the essential oil concentration increased film thickness ( p < .05). The results of this study correlate with the thickness results of Ojagh et al. ( 2010) regarding the addition of cinnamon essential oil to chitosan film.
